name: ExpenseTracker
description: Flutter application with offline-first personal finance management system with optional cloud synchronization, secure local storage, and analytical insights.

name: shoesShopApp
description: A lightweight, educational Flutter shopping app built to explore UI layout, state management with Provider, and basic e-commerce flows.

name: weatherApp
description: A small, focused Weather App built with Flutter â€” a practice project while learning Flutter. It demonstrates networking, JSON parsing, and responsive UI.

name: my_chat_app
description: My Chat App is a modern, user-friendly chat application built with Flutter. It allows users to communicate in real-time and share images.

name: WebScraping_PredictionModel
description: Two data science projects: house price prediction using web-scraped data from Zameen.com, and PUBG player statistics analysis.

name: Mini-Jarvis
description: Mini Jarvis is a simple voice assistant built using Python that can perform basic voice-controlled tasks like opening Google and playing music.

name: TicTacToeGUI
description: Tic Tac Toe game developed in C++ using the SFML graphics library. It provides a modern GUI with multiple gameplay modes including AI.

name: SonicGameClone
description: This project is a 2D platformer game featuring Sonic the Hedgehog, implemented with a focus on OOP concepts such as inheritance and polymorphism.

name: Space-Shooter
description: A dynamic, graphics-based space shooter game built with C++ and SFML. Battle waves of enemies and survive challenging levels.

name: XonicGamePF
description: Xonic is a compact 2D game implemented in C++ using the SFML library, featuring arcade-style gameplay and interactive graphics.

name: 2048_GAME
description: A single-player sliding tile puzzle game. The objective is to slide numbered tiles on a grid to combine them to create the 2048 tile.

name: MINESWEEPER_GRAPHICS_SFML
description: A graphical implementation of the classic Minesweeper game using SFML, featuring smooth graphics and intuitive controls.

name: LUDO_SFML_GRAPHIC
description: A compact Ludo board game using SFML for graphics, audio and window management. Great for learning C++ Game engineering.

name: PredictionModel
description: A comprehensive C++ application for store analytics, sales forecasting, and data-driven decision making using clustering algorithms.

name: LeetCodePractice
description: This repository contains my solutions to LeetCode problems solved during Data Structures and Algorithms practice, organized by topic.

name: ManagementSystems
description: Collection of console-based management system projects in C++ using OOP, including Banking, Student Records, and Inventory systems.

name: taskSimulation
description: A compact C++ OOP demo implementing a role-based task and messaging system with policy enforcement and authentication.

name: UNO_GAME
description: A terminal implementation of the classic UNO card game allowing two players to play against each other with standard mechanics.

name: ShopingPortalOnline
description: An Online console based shopping portal featuring vendor, admin, and manager roles with complex interaction patterns.

name: Software-Testing
description: A C++ programming assignment framework featuring a structured template system for algorithm validation and integrated testing.
